Author: AgnusNonDeus

Comment: More expensive Xboxes doesn’t make an economic crisis.  Gen Z has been utterly failed. Their education is awful. Discipline in schools has effectively been outlawed. There has been nothing to counter the diseased crap they consume all day long on social media. Most teachers have given up on even getting them to read a single book. The pandemic and post-2008 normalized living at home while giving them less supervision from parents who were forced to work longer hours at lower pay. And they are the most entitled generation yet.  Look at some of their answers- “don’t have time” and “don’t know where to look” are common answers to why they don’t have jobs. They HAVE time. They’re fucking unemployed! They can figure this shit out with goddamned Google. Many just don’t WANT to work in an economy that has had very low unemployment.  They have been failed at every turn by Boomers and Gen X. But now they have to stand the fuck up on their own, no matter how diseased their culture and upbringing is. They are not facing their own economic crisis, and all signs suggest it wouldn’t change much if they did.
